rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示阿片类药物制造商滥用科学证据约翰霍普金斯大学彭博公共卫生学院的研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，处方阿片类止痛药的制造商和营销人员滥用科学证据，提出关于处方阿片类药物安全性和有效性的五种常见且不准确的主张，包括它们不会成瘾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Study-reveals-misuse-of-scientific-evidence-by-opioid-makers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Study-reveals-misuse-of-scientific-evidence-by-opioid-makers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b292d659-ac5a-4acc-8d8d-1b4130c618fa Fri, 25 Oct 2024 21:19:09 -0400 Study reveals misuse of scientific evidence by opioid makers
ClinGen 发布了 2700 多个与遗传病相关的基因的数据临床基因组资源 (ClinGen) 是美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助的资源，致力于定义基因和变异的临床相关性，已发布了 2,700 多个与遗传疾病相关的基因的数据，包括癌症、心血管疾病疾病和神经发育障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/ClinGen-publishes-data-on-over-2700-genes-relevant-to-genic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/ClinGen-publishes-data-on-over-2700-genes-relevant-to-genic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ce8e37a-a72a-4b38-bdc5-61d98ff20b59 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 20:58:10 -0400 ClinGen publishes data on over 2700 genes relevant to genetic diseases
研究揭示铜绿假单胞菌对常见清洁剂的耐药性一项新研究揭示了一种主要细菌病原体对医院和家庭常用清洁剂中的活性成分存在广泛的耐药性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Study-reveals-resistance-of-Pseudomonas-aeruginosa-to-common-cleaning-agents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Study-reveals-resistance-of-Pseudomonas-aeruginosa-to-common-cleaning-agents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5af9b50b-d61a-4644-9d09-f6290158f98f Fri, 25 Oct 2024 20:53:52 -0400 Study reveals resistance of Pseudomonas aeruginosa to common cleaning agents
微型磁性软机器人为靶向药物输送铺平了道路新加坡南洋理工大学（NTU Singapore）的一个科学家团队开发了颗粒大小的软机器人，可以使用磁场进行控制以进行靶向药物输送，为未来可能改进的治疗方法铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Tiny-magnet-soft-robots-pave-the-way-for-targeted-drug-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Tiny-magnet-soft-robots-pave-the-way-for-targeted-drug-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41055a62-414c-4b30-a802-b88e8347d3e6 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 20:49:32 -0400 Tiny magnetic soft robots pave the way for targeted drug delivery
回顾强调了用于心脏保健的柔性光电子学的进展中国科学院化学研究所科学家的一篇综述论文总结了用于可穿戴和植入式心脏保健的生物集成柔性可拉伸光电子学的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Review-highlights-advances-in-flexible-opto electronics-for-cardiac-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Review-highlights-advances-in-flexible-opto electronics-for-cardiac-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0c72500-09c6-4db5-81a3-47df0d768ac1 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 20:44:07 -0400 Review highlights advances in flexible optoelectronics for cardiac healthcare
新的人工智能工具彻底改变了罕见胃肠道疾病的检测来自慕尼黑大学、柏林工业大学和夏里特大学的研究人员开发了一种新的人工智能工具，该工具还可以使用成像数据来检测不太常见的胃肠道疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/New-AI-tool-revolutionizes-detection-of-rare-胃肠道-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/New-AI-tool-revolutionizes-detection-of-rare-胃肠道-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c25aa55-09dd-431d-abd5-b7356028f4ab Fri, 25 Oct 2024 20:38:00 -0400 New AI tool revolutionizes detection of rare gastrointestinal diseases
研究人员解锁光控细胞活动的潜力Paul Scherrer 研究所 PSI 的研究人员成功阐明了特定光感受器的结构。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Researchers-unlock-pottial-of-light-control-cellular-activities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Researchers-unlock-pottial-of-light-control-cellular-activities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5204110-7de5-419b-bc3d-b8dff5b8baa8 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 15:12:58 -0400 Researchers unlock potential of light-controlled cellular activities
MASLD 逆转后肝脏 DNA 损伤反应持续激活代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪性肝病（MASLD）及其更高级的形式，代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪性肝炎，已成为全球最常见的肝脏疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Persistent-activation-of-DNA-damage-response-in-the-liver-after-MASLD-reversal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Persistent-activation-of-DNA-damage-response-in-the-liver-after-MASLD-reversal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c0bb92e-7040-4072-a4d8-4457b73710e6 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 15:00:55 -0400 Persistent activation of DNA damage response in the liver after MASLD reversal
气候变化影响芝加哥的花粉模式和过敏敏感性多年来，人们一直听说气候变化对植物植被模式产生重大影响，并影响花粉和霉菌的产生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Climate-change-impacts-pollen-patterns-and-allergy-sensitization-in-Chicago.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Climate-change-impacts-pollen-patterns-and-allergy-sensitization-in-Chicago.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f170aef-c4ef-4d04-93d5-5e38ee5cc020 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 14:56:33 -0400 Climate change impacts pollen patterns and allergy sensitization in Chicago
CRISPR基因编辑疗法的单一治疗为遗传性血管性水肿患者带来了希望基于 CRISPR-Cas9 的基因编辑疗法的单一治疗足以取代遗传性血管水肿 (HAE) 患者的日常药物治疗，HAE 是一种以严重、疼痛和突然肿胀为特征的疾病，有时会导致死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Single-treatment-with-CRISPR-gene-editing-therapy-offers-hope-for-hereditary-angioedema-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241025/Single-treatment-with-CRISPR-gene-editing-therapy-offers-hope-for-hereditary-angioedema-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3229904c-e00c-428d-a2bc-5f02405b9928 Fri, 25 Oct 2024 14:50:52 -0400 Single treatment with CRISPR gene editing therapy offers hope for hereditary angioedema patients
